com.almasb.fxgl.texture

Class DynamicAnimatedTexture

  • java.lang.Object
    • javafx.scene.Node
      • javafx.scene.image.ImageView
        • com.almasb.fxgl.texture.Texture
          • com.almasb.fxgl.texture.DynamicAnimatedTexture
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    UpdateEventListener, javafx.css.Styleable, javafx.event.EventTarget

    public final class DynamicAnimatedTexture
extends Texture
implements UpdateEventListener
    Represents a dynamic animated texture. It is similar to StaticAnimatedTexture, but has animation channels, like WALK, RUN, IDLE, ATTACK, etc. which can be set dynamically to alter the animation.
    Author:
    Almas Baimagambetov (AlmasB) (almaslvl@gmail.com)

    • Method Detail

      • setAnimationChannel

        public void setAnimationChannel(AnimationChannel channel)
        Set animation channel. If animation channel wasn't registered when creating instance of DynamicAnimatedTexture, this method will throw IllegalArgumentException.
        Parameters:
        channel - animation channel

      • setAnimationChannel

        public void setAnimationChannel(AnimationChannel channel,
                                Runnable onAnimationEnd)
        Set animation channel. If animation channel wasn't registered when creating instance of DynamicAnimatedTexture, this method will throw IllegalArgumentException.
        Parameters:
        channel - animation channel
        onAnimationEnd - callback run when animation channel ends

      • getCurrentChannel

        public AnimationChannel getCurrentChannel()
        Returns:
        current channel
